00038 class TinyTreeView(QTreeView):
00039         def contextMenuEvent( self, event ):
00040                 index = self.indexAt( event.pos() )
00041                 delegate = self.itemDelegate( index )
00042                 if not isinstance(delegate, AbstractFieldDelegate):
00043                         return
00044                 delegate.showPopupMenu( self, self.mapToGlobal( event.pos() ) )
00045 
00046         def sizeHintForColumn( self, column ):
00047                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00048                 model = self.model()
00049                 # We expect a KooModel here!
00050                 group = model.recordGroup()
00051                 records = group.loadedRecords()
00052                 # If all records are loaded it's faster to use the C++ implementation
00053                 if len(records) == group.count():
00054                         QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00055                         return QTreeView.sizeHintForColumn( self, column )
00056                 viewOptions = self.viewOptions()
00057                 delegate = self.itemDelegateForColumn( column )
00058                 hint = 0
00059                 for record in records:
00060                         index = model.indexFromId( record.id )
00061                         index = model.index( index.row(), column, index.parent() )
00062                         hint = max( hint, delegate.sizeHint( viewOptions, index ).width() )
00063                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00064                 return hint
00065 
00066         def moveCursor( self, action, modifiers ):
00067                 index = self.currentIndex()
00068                 if not index.isValid():
00069                         return QModelIndex()
00070                 row = index.row()
00071                 column = index.column()
00072                 lastRow = index.model().rowCount() - 1
00073                 lastColumn = index.model().columnCount() - 1
00074                 if action == QAbstractItemView.MoveUp:
00075                         row -= 1
00076                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveDown:
00077                         row += 1
00078                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveLeft:
00079                         column -= 1
00080                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveRight:
00081                         column += 1
00082                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveHome:
00083                         if column == 0:
00084                                 row = 0
00085                         else:
00086                                 column = 0 
00087                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveEnd:
00088                         if column == lastColumn:
00089                                 row = lastRow
00090                         else:
00091                                 column = lastColumn
00092                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MovePageUp:
00093                         row -= 12 
00094                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MovePageDown:
00095                         row += 12 
00096                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MoveNext:
00097                         column += 1
00098                 elif action == QAbstractItemView.MovePrevious:
00099                         column -= 1
00100 
00101                 if column > lastColumn:
00102                         column = 0
00103                         row += 1
00104                 elif column < 0:
00105                         column = lastColumn
00106                         row -= 1
00107                 if row < 0:
00108                         column = 0
00109                         row = 0
00110                 elif row > lastRow:
00111                         row = lastRow
00112                         column = 0
00113                 return self.model().createIndex( row, column, index.internalPointer() )

00115 class TreeView( AbstractView ):
00116 
00117         def __init__(self, parent, widgetType='tree'):
00118                 AbstractView.__init__(self, parent)
00119                 self._widgetType = widgetType
00120                 self.treeModel = None
00121                 self.reload = False
00122                 self.title=""
00123                 self.selecting = False
00124                 self.setAddOnTop( False )
00125 
00126                 if self._widgetType == 'tree':
00127                         self.widget = TinyTreeView( self )
00128                         self.widget.setAllColumnsShowFocus( False )
00129                         self.widget.setSortingEnabled(True)
00130                         self.widget.setRootIsDecorated( False )
00131                         self.widget.setAlternatingRowColors( True )
00132                         self.widget.setVerticalScrollMode( QAbstractItemView.ScrollPerItem )
00133                         self.widget.sortByColumn( 0, Qt.AscendingOrder )
00134                         self.widget.setDragEnabled( True )
00135                         self.widget.setAcceptDrops( True )
00136                         self.widget.setDropIndicatorShown( True );
00137                         self.widget.setDragDropMode( QAbstractItemView.InternalMove )
00138 
00139                         # We set uniformRowHeights property to True because this allows some 
00140                         # optimizations. It makes a really big difference in models with thousands 
00141                         # of tuples because moving to the end of the list only requires to query
00142                         # for those items at the end (those that are shown) wheras if we don't
00143                         # guarantee that all items have the same height, all previous items
00144                         # need to be loaded too so the view can measure what height they are
00145                         # and in which position the scroll is.
00146                         self.widget.setUniformRowHeights( True )
00147                 elif self._widgetType == 'list':
00148                         self.widget = QListView( self )
00149                         self.widget.setViewMode( QListView.IconMode )
00150                         self.widget.setFlow( QListView.LeftToRight )
00151                         self.widget.setGridSize( QSize( 200, 20 ) )
00152                         self.widget.setResizeMode( QListView.Adjust )
00153                 elif self._widgetType == 'table':
00154                         self._widgetType = 'table'
00155                         self.widget = QTableView( self )
00156 
00157                 # Set focus proxy so other widgets can try to setFocus to us
00158                 # and the focus is set to the expected widget.
00159                 self.setFocusProxy( self.widget )
00160 
00161                 # Contains list of aggregated fields
00162                 self.aggregates = []
00163                 self.aggregatesContainer = QWidget( self )
00164                 self.aggregatesLayout = QHBoxLayout( self.aggregatesContainer )
00165                 self.aggregatesLayout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00166 
00167                 self.setAllowMultipleSelection(True)
00168 
00169                 self.connect( self.widget, SIGNAL('activated(QModelIndex)'), self.activated )
00170 
00171                 self.currentIndex = self.widget.rootIndex()
00172 
00173                 layout = QVBoxLayout()
00174                 layout.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
00175                 layout.addWidget( self.widget )
00176                 layout.addWidget( self.aggregatesContainer )
00177                 self.setLayout( layout )
00178                 self.setReadOnly( True )
00179         
00180         def viewType(self):
00181                 return 'tree'
00182 
00183         def setGridWidth( self, width ):
00184                 if self._widgetType == 'list':
00185                         self.widget.setGridSize( QSize( width, self.widget.gridSize().height() ) )
00186 
00187         def setGridHeight( self, height ):
00188                 if self._widgetType == 'list':
00189                         self.widget.setGridSize( QSize( self.widget.gridSize().width(), height ) )
00190 
00191         def setModel( self, model ):
00192                 self.treeModel = model  
00193                 self.widget.setModel( self.treeModel )
00194                 self.connect( self.widget.selectionModel(),SIGNAL('currentChanged(QModelIndex, QModelIndex)'),self.currentChanged)
00195                 self.connect( self.treeModel, SIGNAL('rowsInserted(const QModelIndex &,int,int)'), self.updateAggregates )
00196                 self.connect( self.treeModel, SIGNAL('rowsRemoved(const QModelIndex &,int,int)'), self.updateAggregates )
00197                 self.connect( self.treeModel, SIGNAL('modelReset()'), self.updateAggregates )
00198 
00199 
00200         def addAggregate( self, name, label, bold, digits ):
00201                 aggLabel = QLabel( label + ':', self.aggregatesContainer )
00202                 aggLabel.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Fixed, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00203                 aggValue = QLabel( self.aggregatesContainer )
00204                 aggValue.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Fixed, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00205                 if bold:
00206                         font = QFont()
00207                         font.setBold( True )
00208                         aggLabel.setFont( font )
00209                         aggValue.setFont( font )
00210                 self.aggregatesLayout.addWidget( aggLabel )
00211                 self.aggregatesLayout.addWidget( aggValue )
00212                 self.aggregatesLayout.addSpacing( 10 )
00213                 self.aggregates.append( { 'name': name, 'widget': aggValue, 'digits': digits } )
00214 
00215         def finishAggregates(self):
00216                 self.aggregatesLayout.addSpacing( 10 )
00217                 # The uiUpdateAggregates QLabel will be shown only when not all records are loaded in the record group.
00218                 # In such a case, aggregates are not calculated and the user must clic the link in the label in order
00219                 # to see aggregates calculated.
00220                 self.uiUpdateAggregates = QLabel( _('<a href="update">Update totals</a>'), self.aggregatesContainer )
00221                 self.uiUpdateAggregates.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Fixed, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00222                 self.connect( self.uiUpdateAggregates, SIGNAL('linkActivated(QString)'), self.forceAggregatesUpdate )
00223                 self.aggregatesLayout.addWidget( self.uiUpdateAggregates )
00224                 self.aggregatesLayout.addStretch( 0 )
00225 
00226         ## @brief Forces calculation of aggregates, even if not all records in the group have been loaded yet.
00227         def forceAggregatesUpdate(self, url):
00228                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00229                 self.treeModel.group.ensureAllLoaded()
00230                 self.updateAggregates()
00231                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00232 
00233         # This signal is emited when a list item is double clicked
00234         # or activated, only when it's read-only.
00235         # Used by the search dialog to "accept" the choice or by
00236         # Screen to switch view
00237         def activated(self, index):
00238                 if self._readOnly:
00239                         self.emit( SIGNAL('activated()') )
00240 
00241         def currentChanged(self, current):
00242                 if self.selecting:
00243                         return
00244                 self.currentIndex = current
00245                 # We send the current model. Previously we sent only the id of the model, but
00246                 # new models have id=None
00247                 self.emit( SIGNAL("currentChanged(PyQt_PyObject)"), self.treeModel.recordFromIndex(current) )
00248                 self.updateAggregates()
00249 
00250         def store(self):
00251                 pass
00252 
00253         def reset(self):
00254                 pass
00255 
00256         def setSelected(self, model):
00257                 return
00258                 idx = self.treeModel.indexFromId(model)
00259                 if idx != None:
00260                         self.selecting = True
00261                         self.widget.selectionModel().setCurrentIndex( idx, QItemSelectionModel.ClearAndSelect | QItemSelectionModel.Rows)
00262                         self.selecting = False
00263 
00264         def display(self, currentModel, models):
00265                 # TODO: Avoid setting the model group each time...
00266                 self.treeModel.setRecordGroup( models )
00267                 if self._widgetType != 'tree':
00268                         self.treeModel.sort( 0, Qt.AscendingOrder )
00269                 self.updateAggregates()
00270                 if not currentModel:
00271                         self.selectFirst()
00272                 else:
00273                         idx = self.treeModel.indexFromId( currentModel.id )
00274                         if idx:
00275                                 self.widget.setCurrentIndex( idx )
00276                                 self.widget.selectionModel().select( self.widget.currentIndex(), QItemSelectionModel.SelectCurrent | QItemSelectionModel.Rows )
00277 
00278         ## @brief Selects the first item of the list.
00279         def selectFirst(self):
00280                 index = self.treeModel.index( 0, 0 )
00281                 if not index.isValid():
00282                         return
00283                 
00284                 self.widget.setCurrentIndex( index )
00285                 self.widget.selectionModel().select( self.widget.currentIndex(), QItemSelectionModel.SelectCurrent | QItemSelectionModel.Rows )
00286 
00287         ## @brief Selects all items of the list.
00288         def selectAll(self):
00289                 start = self.treeModel.index( 0, 0 )
00290                 end = self.treeModel.index( self.treeModel.rowCount() - 1, 0 )
00291                 selection = QItemSelection( start, end )
00292                 self.widget.selectionModel().select( selection, QItemSelectionModel.SelectCurrent | QItemSelectionModel.Rows )
00293 
00294         def selectedIds(self):
00295                 ids = []
00296                 selectedIndexes = self.widget.selectionModel().selectedRows()
00297                 for i in selectedIndexes:
00298                         ids.append( self.treeModel.id( i ) )
00299                 return ids
00300 
00301         def setAllowMultipleSelection(self, value):
00302                 if value:
00303                         self.widget.setSelectionMode( QAbstractItemView.ExtendedSelection )
00304                 else:
00305                         self.widget.setSelectionMode( QAbstractItemView.SingleSelection )
00306 
00307         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00308                 self._readOnly = value
00309                 # We only allow changing sort order when the view is read only
00310                 # TODO: Uncomment this
00311                 #self.widget.setSortingEnabled( value )
00312                 if self._readOnly:
00313                         self.widget.setEditTriggers( QAbstractItemView.NoEditTriggers ) 
00314                         self.widget.setTabKeyNavigation( False )
00315                 else:
00316                         self.widget.setEditTriggers( QAbstractItemView.DoubleClicked | QAbstractItemView.EditKeyPressed | QAbstractItemView.AnyKeyPressed | QAbstractItemView.SelectedClicked )
00317                         # Allow tab navigation because otherwise non editable fields
00318                         # make tab go out of the widget when editting.
00319                         self.widget.setTabKeyNavigation( True )
00320         
00321         def isReadOnly(self):
00322                 return self._readOnly
00323 
00324         ## @brief Updates aggregates values. Note that if some records have not been loaded it 
00325         # will show a hyphen instead of the appropiate value, avoiding long load times for some
00326         # screens.
00327         def updateAggregates(self):
00328                 if self.treeModel.group and self.aggregates:
00329                         if self.treeModel.group.unloadedIds():
00330                                 self.uiUpdateAggregates.show()
00331                                 calculate = False
00332                         else:
00333                                 self.uiUpdateAggregates.hide()
00334                                 calculate = True
00335                 else:
00336                         calculate = False
00337                         self.uiUpdateAggregates.hide()
00338 
00339                 for agg in self.aggregates:
00340                         # As we don't want the aggregates to force loading all records
00341                         # don't calculate aggregates if there are unloaded records.
00342                         if calculate:
00343                                 value = 0.0
00344                                 for model in self.treeModel.group:
00345                                         value += model.value(agg['name'])
00346                                 agg['widget'].setText( Numeric.floatToText( value, agg['digits'] ) )
00347                         else:
00348                                 agg['widget'].setText( '-' )
00349 
00350         def startEditing(self):
00351                 self.widget.edit( self.widget.currentIndex() )
00352 
00353         def addOnTop(self):
00354                 return self._addOnTop
00355 
00356         def setAddOnTop(self, add):
00357                 self._addOnTop = add
00358 
00359         def viewSettings(self):
00360                 if self._widgetType in ('list','table'):
00361                         return ''
00362                 header = self.widget.header()
00363                 return str( header.saveState().toBase64() )
00364 
00365         def setViewSettings(self, settings):
00366                 if not settings or self._widgetType in ('list','table'):
00367                         return
00368                 header = self.widget.header()
00369                 header.restoreState( QByteArray.fromBase64( settings ) )
